modName: Dremora Butler and Merchant Face Overhaul
summary: This mod overhauls the faces of the Dremora butler and Dremora merchant from the Dragonborn DLC.
descriptionHtml:
----------------------------------------------------------------------
Description
----------------------------------------------------------------------
The original Dremora butler and merchant both use the Dremora morph race. This mod changes their Morph Race to the Dark Elf morph race to make them look like the vanilla Dremora in Skyrim.

Edit: I accidentally copied the NIF files into the textures folder instead of the textures. I fixed this and the textures should now be in the textures folder.


----------------------------------------------------------------------
Requirements
----------------------------------------------------------------------
[color=#f1f1f1]- Dragonborn DLC


----------------------------------------------------------------------
Installation (Manual Only)
----------------------------------------------------------------------
Drop the "data" folder into your Skyrim folder.




[/color]
author: Zinova
